name: Sinner Party
description:
Your job is to host a dinner party for the denizens of Hell. They're a gluttonous bunch, lazy too. So it's up to you to keep them fed and satisfy their appetites.

CONTROLS:
Pick up food with right mouse, release to throw.
Encourage guests to open up to you by singling them out with left mouse.
As soon as all guests have taken their leave your job will be complete.
